title: What is SWIFT? How could kicking Russia out of the banking system impact the country?
description: What is SWIFT? Here's what you need to know about why Russia could be kicked out of the banking system.
content:
President Biden on Thursday announced a new round of sanctions against Russia after its invasion of Ukraine hours earlier.
